Description: Moe's Guitars, Our philosophy: If we wouldn't play it, we wouldn't sell it; it's that simple.Get it in time for ChristmasA magnificent example of a CR6 from Gibson's Custom Shop weighing just 7 lbs 12.7 ozs. Other than the beautiful matched top and finish what is truly exception is the neck carve. It is a soft shoulder 55 profile that is the most comfortable neck in my opinion Gibson ever produced.Other than having a custom carved bone nut installed by Phil D'Angelo the instrument is 100% original. No cracks, No Rash or Worming. The instruments integrity is 100% spot on! It has tons of fret life and plays without dead spots or choking across the register. The P90's are bold and crisp with the vintage tone of early Rock n Roll.Neck Dimensions Width1.695 1st fret center1.828 5th fret center2.029 12 fret centerDepth0.89 1st fret center0.89 5th fret center0.94 12th fret centerWhen held up to light there are a few tiny dings on the lower bout of the top and back. Nothing that shouldn't be there for a instrument of 14 years in age.Ships in its original Custom Shop Case with all hang tags and case candy.
Title: Gibson Les Paul Custom Shop '56 CR6
Subtitle: Les Paul
ConditionDescription: When held up to light there are a few tiny dings on the lower bout of the top and back. Nothing that shouldn't be there for a instrument of 14 years in age.
